name: Chris Barry
bio: I'm a web developer from NYC, focusing on Node, Javascript and React. I love learning the newest technologies to create great web experiences. I'm currently at [Great Jones](//greatjones.co) Previously, I worked at **Kip**, where I worked on a Slack bot and later worked in a team creating an entirely new frontend in React.
interests: I love working in frontend, especially React and CSS. Right now I'm working with Typescript with React and styling in JS with Material-UI

details: Worked with the Digital Business team to create internal HTML and JavaScript apps for testing and searching
Created complex modular JavaScript grids including session storage, searching, and sorting

Aided work on Wordpress Site, including setting up A/B testing with Parsely
